anime.description: The story centers around an elementary school teacher who is so stupid that he cannot even write his own name. He does whatever he likes in his classroom. Plus, by all appearances, he is not human. Source: ANN

tag.name: kodomo
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, the word kodomo refers to a children`s audience roughly for the ages 12 and younger. In Japanese, the word means simply "child", and has no anime/manga-related connotations at all. It does not comprise a style or a genre per se, but rather indicates the publisher`s intended target demographic.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: その名もパスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
And His Name Is Pascal-Sensei / Perfect Plate
Sono Na wa Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: Hayato`s 4th grade class returns from spring break to find they have a strange new homeroom teacher. What chaos and hijinks will ensue? Meanwhile, two adventurers embark on an epic quest in a parallel fantasy universe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の不良, 立花ひかる / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座
Legendary Delinquent, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
Densetsu no Furyou, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
episode.summary: With the return of the legendary delinquent Tachibana Hikaru, Pascal is in for the showdown of his life! Meanwhile, a young entrepreneur discovers the risks of product testing, and Kitano Yuusuke sends a message. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マイネームイズ転校生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
My Name Is Transfer Student / Perfect Plate
My Name Is Tenkousei / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: There`s a new transfer student in town, and boy is he a doozy! Will his stuck-up attitude prove too much for Pascal and the rest of class 4-1? Meanwhile, a servant of the dark lord is haunted by demons from his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖! 100%身体検査 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Terror! 100% Physical Exam / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Kyoufu! 100% Shintai Kensa / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: Today is class 4-1`s physical exam, but someone doesn`t seem very excited? What strange tests await Pascal`s students? Meanwhile, our adventurers learn about being an adult and taking responsibility, and Hayato and Pascal investigate some footage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あなたの知らない職員室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座
The Faculty Room You Don`t Get to See / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
Anata no Shiranai Shokuinshitsu / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
episode.summary: Have you ever wondered what goes on in the school`s faculty room? The students of 4-1 discover more than they bargained for! Meanwhile, a fallen hero confronts his dark side, and Steve learns the wisdom of the ancients. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ディス イズ 誕生パーティー / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
This Is Birthday Party / Perfect Plate
This Is Tanjou Party / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: It`s Steve`s birthday, and everyone`s invited! Except Pascal—who shows up anyway, and with quite the present! Meanwhile, a weary adventurer pays the price for getting what he wants. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: これがウワサの五月病 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
Also Known as May Sickness / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Kore ga Uwasa no Gogatsubyou / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: Class 4-1 comes to school one day to discover that their teacher Pascal is suffering from a terrible illness: May Sickness! Meanwhile, a wandering hero faces the injustice of those who abuse their power, and Pascal teaches how to correctly speak English. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぬきうちテストに気をつけろ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
Beware of Pop Quizzes! / Perfect Plate
Nukiuchi Test ni Ki o Tsukero! / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: Pop quizzes are supposed to be surprising, but can class 4-1 handle the surprises Pascal has in store for them? Meanwhile, a weary traveler finds the strength to continue in an unlikely place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パスカルジュニアの育て方 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
How to Raise a Pascal Junior / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Pascal Junior no Sodatekata / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: Ever wish you had a handbook for how to raise a child? Pascal learns that it`s not as handy as it seems! Meanwhile, a villain gone astray learns to accept his identity, and Pascal teaches some more "correct" English. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スペース避難訓練 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座
Space Evacuation Drill / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
Space Hinankunren / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
episode.summary: Students must be prepared for any emergency that might happen at school. But Pascal`s safety drills turn out to be out of this world! Meanwhile, a pretender learns the consequences of his hubris, and Hayato learns from the wisdom of the ancients. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 入るなキケン! 動物教室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Danger! Keep Out! Zoo Classroom / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Hairuna Kiken! Doubutsu Kyoushitsu / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: If you thought your school was a zoo, wait till you see what Pascal-sensei has brought to class today! Meanwhile, a young ruler finds the courage to stand up for himself, and Chika tests her observational skills. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命を分ける席替え / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座
The Seating Change of Destiny / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
Unmei o Wakeru Sekigae / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
episode.summary: A student`s seat in the classroom can change the course of their school life, but class 4-1 finds themselves playing musical chairs with more than just classroom seats. Meanwhile, a ravaged wanderer finds warmth in the wasteland, and Hayato learns about communicating with friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エンジョイ! 林間学校 前編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
Enjoy! Nature Camp Part One / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Enjoy! Rinkangakkou Zenpen / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: It`s time for the big school event: nature camp! Pascal`s behaving like a proper teacher for once, but will it last? Meanwhile, the heir to a kingdom finds the light of bravery in the darkness, and Mr. DiCaprio learns how not to be rude in English. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 100%デンジャラスプール / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座
100% Dangerous Pool / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
100% Dangerous Pool / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
episode.summary: The sun`s out, and the school pool`s open! But class 4-1 soon finds that Pascal`s swimming lessons have them going off the deep end! Meanwhile, a would-be hero learns that false pretenses can`t fool those who matter, and Steve receives the wisdom of the centuries. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追跡!! パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
Follow Him!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Tsuiseki!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
episode.summary: Pascal`s taken off early for summer break, but where could he have gone? Can Steve`s super-sleuth hound piece together the clues? Meanwhile, a stranger in a strange land finds society shuns his customs, and Pascal shows you don`t need to be rich to eat like a king. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎の転校生, 伊集院きらり / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Mysterious Transfer Student, Ijuuin Kirari / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Nazo no Tenkousei, Ijuuin Kirari / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: Class 4-1 has a new student, but she doesn`t seem to be making any friends! Can the class find any common ground with her? Meanwhile, a peek into the future reveals hunger and loss, and Iwata learns the importance of hair hygiene. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パスカル先生の夏休み / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
Pascal-sensei`s Summer Vacation / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Pascal-sensei no Natsuyasumi / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
episode.summary: Looks like summer was draining for Pascal, but will his video diary explain what happened or just raise more questions? Meanwhile, even a land of terrors can become a world of joy, and Pascal reveals the secret to eating fresh fruit out of season. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パスカル プロデュース 花火大会 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座
Pascal-Produced Fireworks Festival / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
Pascal Produce Hanabi Taikai / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
episode.summary: Fireworks festivals are the best part of summer break! The food, the games, the show... but what happens when Pascal`s in the mix? Meanwhile, new money gets a first-class experience, and Kitano Yuusuke sends an invaluable message. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真夏のヒマヒマパスカル / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
A Midsummer`s Idle Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Manatsu no Himahima Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: Did you spend your summer break being productive, or just idling around? Pascal proves that you can even take idling to new heights! Meanwhile, a tenacious challenger learns that attempting the impossible will only lead to ruin, and Kitano Yuusuke senses more than anyone bargained for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エンジョイ! 林間学校 後編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Enjoy! Nature Camp Part Two / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Enjoy! Rinkangakkou Kouhen / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: Nature camp continues, with class 4-1 now in dire straits! Will they succumb to Pascal`s devious machinations? Meanwhile, a traveler journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 秘密のパスカル室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座
The Secret Pascal Room / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
Himitsu no Pascal Shitsu / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
episode.summary: Pascal`s left the assignments back in his office, so Hayato and the gang go help him retrieve them. No, not the faculty room. The Pascal room... and who knows what waits inside? Meanwhile, a mad scientist does not rip off Dragonball Z, and Chika learns the wisdom of the ancients. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 北野ゆうすけの真実 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
The Truth of Kitano Yuusuke / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Kitano Yuusuke no Shinjitsu / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
episode.summary: Kitano Yuusuke is just another normal, perfectly human student, but he`s behaving awfully strangely today. As humans do. Probably some human chemical destabilizing his human brain. Meanwhile, a lord of darkness faces his greatest challenge yet, and Pascal serves up some café au lait, sans the café. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仇討ち! スーパーパスカル / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
Revenge! Super Pascal / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Adauchi! Super Pascal / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: A good teacher will do anything for his students, and the same goes for Pascal. When Steve is kidnapped, can Super Pascal save the day? Meanwhile, a man from another age discovers modern cuisine, and Pascal starts an American car wash. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勃発! アイスの乱! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
Crisis! The Battle for Ice Cream! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Bappatsu! Ice no Ran! / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: When school lunch includes an ice cream, it`s a special treat. But things get hairy when there`s one extra left over, and class 4-1 tries to decide who gets it. Meanwhile, a hero is confronted with a nigh insurmountable task on his path to greatness, and Pascal teaches the right way to pronounce potato. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイ アム 影武者 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳
I Am Shadow Warrior / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
I Am Kagemusha / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
episode.summary: What could be more obnoxious than one Steve? How about two? Steve discovers he`s had a shadowy body double all along, who now wants to be something more! Meanwhile, a sinister conspirator discovers the persuasive power of a turn of phrase, and Pascal composes a verse to help a student in need. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 調理実習王 決定戦!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
Battle for the King of Home Ec!! / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Chouri Jisshuu Ou: Ketteisen!! / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
episode.summary: It`s time for class 4-1 to put their cooking skills to the test in this Home Ec throwdown! Who will create the best egg dish? Wait... what happened to the egg? Meanwhile, a new start reminds us of the importance of using protection, and Kirari gets a taste of high-class living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仰天! 0%パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Shock! 0% Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Gyouten! 0% Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: Ever wonder what the 100% in the title means? Probably not, but you`re getting an answer anyway! Find out what happens when the hitherto nonexistent meter above Pascal`s head drops to 0%! Meanwhile, a fierce final showdown is fought against not-Gollum on not-Mount-Doom, and the resident delinquent takes a stab at 1% Pascal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 体育大魔王 襲来!!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
Attack of the Dark Lord of P.E.!! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Taiiku Daimaou Shuurai!!! / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
episode.summary: It`s school Sports Day, which of course means the arrival of a fearsome, catty alien from outer space! Can Iwata save the Earth from destruction, while avoiding his inevitable Kenny-like fate? Meanwhile, a great hero is reminded of the true strength of youth, and more pointless bilingual puns are presented for your ostensible enjoyment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫才師パスカルやでっ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳
It`s Pascal from the Comic Duo! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Manzaishi Pascal ya de! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
episode.summary: Pascal-sensei is apparently also a member of a comedy duo, and is so confident that he doesn`t need to practice. But once on stage, that confidence seems to have turned into something much much less impressive... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 社会科見学はじめました / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
We`re Doing Social Studies Field Trips / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Kaishaka Kengaku Hajimemashita / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
episode.summary: Today, Pascal-sensei takes the class out to see how a factory operates. Maybe the choice of the ramen factory was not a coincidence, as Pascal-sensei somehow ends up in the production line... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 救世主は誰だ!? / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
Who Is the Savior!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Kyuuseishu wa Dare Da!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
episode.summary: The kids end up in a parallel dystopian world where chaos reigns. Will they be able to find their way back to their own world? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 没落!? 金森財閥 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳
Bankrupt?! The Kanamori Group / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Botsuraku!? Kanamori Zaibatsu / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
episode.summary: Kanamori Steve comes to school in rags as the Kanamori Group goes bankrupt. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: きのえだ小 頂上決戦 後編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part Two / Perfect Plate
Ki no Eda Shou: Choujou Kessen - Kouhen / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: The final matches of the tournament for the top of the school are on! Who are the mysterious fighters behind the mask? And where did the third masked fighter come from? Who will prevail and take the crown?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: きのえだ小 頂上決戦 前編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part One / Perfect Plate
Ki no Eda Shou: Choujou Kessen - Zenpen / Perfect Plate
episode.summary: The thing that Pascal-sensei unveiled to the students of Kinoeda Grade School today was not a surprise test, but something else entirely: a surprise tag battle. Will the students be able to best their opponents against all the odds and make it through the preliminaries?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パスカル先生初めての授業 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 最優秀生徒 大発表!
Pascal-sensei`s First Class / Perfect Plate / Announcement of the Absolutely Best Student!
Pascal-sensei Hajimete Jugyou / Perfect Plate / Saiyuushuu Seito: Dai Happyou!
episode.summary: Today, Pascal-sensei tells the class how he began his journey as a teacher. Then why is he talking about synchronized swimming? Later, the award winners for the best students in 4 categories are announced. Who will win the ultimate award?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイドル活動パスミン! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳
Idol Activity Pasmin! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Idol Katsudou Pasmin! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
episode.summary: What do you spend your time on when you have a day off? Well, get ready for this, because Pascal-sensei spends this time being an idol! In another world, a dangerous riceball makes an appearance. Source: crunchyroll
